TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_sakuw, title = sakuw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/sakuw} }

S.FORM: sakuw sklokah balay hi niqun qu trakis ki sakuw. krawi' hiya' ga, mutu ini' pmhi na bnkis ta' sraral. mutu si phmut hmbku'sa qmayah. hi' nya' ga, m_yan tluling qba'. blaq thkun uzi.
sakow sklokah balay hi niqon qo trakis ki sakow. krawi' hiya' ga, moto ini' pmhi na bnkis ta' sraral. moto si phmot hmbko'sa qmayah. hi' nya' ga, m_yan tloling qba'. blaq thkon ozi.
